body: Well... Not to brag about anything, but this month I really pushed it to see how many monuments I can get. Right now I have 404 which is really good in my opinion. I just wanted to see who the top rushers are on avicus. Just say how many monuments in Nebula you have gotten.

replies.body:
The record in Avicus is 508 monuments which is by me in Avicus. MCZone doesn't count. But now it's broken by luke836 with 564 monuments

But The # of monuments in a month don't really reflect that much. Usually the amount you have in total counts like me and I have 1749 monuments mined in total from May to Now as well as JkAwesome with 1589 monuments in total.
